sentences: Tom Kellichan (born c. 1954) was the original drummer of The Skids, from 1977 to 1979.
After The Skids, he played drums for Bill Nelson (of Be-Bop Deluxe), in the song "Decline And Fall", for the Quit Dreaming And Get On The Beam album (1981).
He is now running a music bar, called "The Sax Bar", in The Patch, Playa de las Am√©ricas, Tenerife; and still playing drums in a house band called Real Deal.
